snippet.title: Stormgate Gameplay Reveal (Pre-Alpha) - PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
Watch the long-awaited gameplay reveal for Stormgate, the upcoming real-time strategy game from Frost Giant Studios.  

Stormgate aims to be the most fun-to-play and most approachable RTS ever. 

The game will feature: 
- crisp, ultra-responsive gameplay
- asymmetric factions (more than two!)
- an ever-evolving campaign playable solo & cooperatively
- three-player co-op vs. AI
- a variety of competitive game modes
- fully-integrated competition for players of all skill levels
- and a powerful custom games editor for creating maps, mods, and more. 

Stormgate is currently in pre-alpha and is being developed exclusively for Windows PC. 

--

Wishlist Stormgate on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2012510/Stormgate/

Visit https://playstormgate.com to sign up for the beta test and follow Stormgate on social media:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayStormgate
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Stormgate/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FrostGiantStudio
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@frostgiantstudio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playstormgate/
Discord: Frost Giant Cave (Unofficial Stormgate & Frost Giant Community): https://discord.gg/bAT2deP
